Package search

Class Gateway

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
search.Gateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, AutoCloseable, Remote, GatewayInterface
public class Gateway extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GatewayInterface, AutoCloseable
The Gateway class serves as the central access point for handling distributed search requests, managing communication between clients and storage barrels.

This implementation includes:

  • Fault tolerance mechanisms for handling remote failures
  • Load balancing between multiple storage barrels
  • Health monitoring and automatic reconnection strategies
Implements GatewayInterface to provide core search and indexing functionalities.

Additionally, this class implements AutoCloseable to ensure proper resource management when shutting down.

See Also:

    • checkInboundLinks

      public List<String> checkInboundLinks(String pageUrl) throws RemoteException
      Checks inbound links pointing to a specific page URL. If no healthy storage barrels are available, attempts reconnection before retrying.
      Specified by:
      checkInboundLinks in interface GatewayInterface
      Parameters:
      pageUrl - The URL to check inbound links for.
      Returns:
      A list of URLs that link to the specified page.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.

    • getTitle

      public static String getTitle(String url)
      Retrieves the title of a webpage by fetching and parsing its HTML.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the webpage.
      Returns:
      The title of the page with the first paragrapher, or "Failed to fetch title" if retrieval fails.

    • getShortCitation

      public static String getShortCitation(String url)
      Extracts a short citation from a webpage. It attempts to fetch the meta description or the first paragraph of the page.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the webpage.
      Returns:
      A short citation or "Failed to fetch citation" if retrieval fails.

    • getSystemState

      public String getSystemState() throws RemoteException
      Returns the current system state including: - The 10 most common search terms. - A list of active barrels and their index sizes. - The average response time (in tenths of a second) per barrel.
      Specified by:
      getSystemState in interface GatewayInterface
      Returns:
      A string representing the system's current state.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.
